top_comments.comment: I don't know why JADINE had so much impact to me. That even stalking to james i.G made me shed. And while watching nadine release this new album still im crying.   Maybe, it's best in order for them to grow and be the better version of themselves. And maybe , just maybe when time is right love will find them back ❤
Ay pang international ang labanan, bakit ba hindi ito nag te trend...mga magandang kanta at video.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Ganun ba talaga pag laos na kunti nalang ang views?

I'm here beacuse I see the Google news that  as Nadine song already finally bring them "closure"

How can I move on?from both of them 🥺 but I Always support they're decision cause I'm only fan! Not their self.

It's been awhile since I have seen her.. her face has changed a lot. Botox? Her lips and cheeks. She was so pretty before.. her voice sounds good though.. I love her in all her movies. I heard she's good in her dramas too.. I haven't seen one.. but the change on her face bothers me. What's wrong with being natural these days?
